issue.message: On SDK version 23 and up, your app data will be automatically backed up and restored on app install. Consider adding the attribute `android:fullBackupContent` to specify an `@xml` resource which configures which files to backup. More info: https://developer.android.com/training/backup/autosyncapi.html
Possible overdraw: Root element paints background `@drawable/nav_movie` with a theme that also paints a background (inferred theme is `@style/Theme.SubmissionMADE`)
The resource `R.drawable.side_nav_bar` appears to be unused
The resource `R.anim.slide_in_right` appears to be unused
The resource `R.anim.slide_out_left` appears to be unused
Found bitmap drawable `res/drawable/nav_movie.png` in densityless folder
Found bitmap drawable `res/drawable/side_nav_bar.png` in densityless folder
